description: Use of weak credentials exists in Seiko Solutions SkyBridge and SkySpider series, which may allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to decrypt password for the WebUI of the product. Affected products and versions are as follows: SkyBridge MB-A200 firmware Ver. 01.00.05 and earlier, SkyBridge BASIC MB-A130 firmware Ver. 1.4.1 and earlier, and SkySpider MB-R210 firmware Ver. 1.01.00 and earlier.

product.name: SkyBridge MB-A200, SkyBridge BASIC MB-A130, and SkySpider MB-R210

enisaIdProduct.product_version: SkyBridge MB-A200 firmware Ver. 01.00.05 and earlier, SkyBridge BASIC MB-A130 firmware Ver. 1.4.1 and earlier, and SkySpider MB-R210 firmware Ver. 1.01.00 and earlier
